de-e-nu ša {m}gab-bu-IGI.LAL ša {m}15-ba-la-ṭi TA {m}da-da-hi TA {m}EN-DINGIR-iq-bu-u-ni ina UGU sa-ar-ti-šu₂-nu TA {LU₂}SIPA.MEŠ-šu₂-nu id-bu-bu-u-ni 01 GIN₂ 1/2 GIN₂ me-me-ni a-na me-me-ni la ih-bil₂ DI-mu ina bir-ta-šu₂-nu man-nu ša ina ur-kiš ina ma-te-me ib-bal-lak-kat₃-u-ni de-e-ni DUG₄.DUG₄ u₂-ba-u-ni Aššur Šamaš Bel Nabu lu EN-de-ni-šu₂ Nisannu UD-21 lim-me La-basi IGI {m}a-kul-la-nu {LU₂}SANGA IGI Sin-naʾdi IGI Nabu-rehtu-uṣur IGI Nergal-šarru-uṣur IGI {m}{ITI}AB-a.a IGI Eriba-Aššur
